name: 1 Hour Less Than: A Realm RI
name_original: 1 Hour Less Than: A Realm RI
description:
While some hero looking guys are asleep in middle of the dark jungle, an evil looking lord who is running away, falls over them. Oh he did not notice, the crystals are on the ground. Now what you will do with the crystals is up to your choices. 

Defeat each 4 bosses with the help of its specific crystal. Just don't leave an area suddenly maybe someone is in danger, so if you leave and then return, it's just too late.

I made this without using any text for dialogues, instead you'll see characters speak through the balloons.

Download at Mediafire

http://www.mediafire.com/file/r9in5e5a1naolxs/1_Hour_Less_Than_A_Realm_RI.zip
